00032 #include "contiki.h"
00033 #include "dev/serial-line.h"
00034 
00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 
00037 PROCESS(test_serial_process, "Serial test process");
00038 AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(&test_serial_process);
00039 
00040 PROCESS_THREAD(test_serial_process, ev, data)
00041 {
00042   static struct etimer et;
00043 
00044   PROCESS_BEGIN();
00045 
00046   etimer_set(&et, CLOCK_SECOND);
00047 
00048   while(1) {
00049     PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT();
00050 
00051     if (etimer_expired(&et)) {
00052       printf("Waiting for serial data\n");
00053       etimer_restart(&et);
00054     }
00055 
00056     if(ev == serial_line_event_message) {
00057       printf("Message received: '%s'\n", data);
00058     }
00059   }
00060 
00061   PROCESS_END();
00062 }
